english.segment1: I flirt with the world. It steals my love for You. My fear grips my faith. And I am left unmoved
english.segment2: Your gaze stops my heart. Your voice fills the dark. Your love is the spark that lights this life. So we rise
english.segment3: Out of the depths you cry. Come and be satisfied. Father, You sing. Father, You sing over Your children
english.segment4: You quiet the storm. Inside my shipwrecked soul. Your spirit will lead. It calls the wayward home
english.segment5: At the sound of Your name. Our sin is washed away. In Christ we're crucified. In You we die, in You we rise
english.segment6: Out of the depths you cry. Come and be satisfied. Father, You sing. Father, You sing over Your children
english.segment7: Let us see through Your eyes. We are Your great delight. Father You sing. Father, You sing over Your children
english.segment8: And we're singing along. Your daughters and sons. We're singing Your song. We are Your children
english.segment9: Out of the depths you cry. Come and be satisfied. Father, You sing. Father, You sing over Your children
english.segment10: Let us see through Your eyes. We are Your great delight. Father, You sing. Father, You sing over Your children
